plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and often bright colors. I grow in the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 Bees like to visit me
💧 I need water and sunlight to grow
💐 People give me as gifts

plant.question: I'm tall and green, with a strong trunk and many branches. Birds like to build their homes in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 You can make paper from me
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me
🍁 I have leaves that change color in the fall

plant.question: I am long, orange, and grow in a garden. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am crunchy
🥗 I am often in salads
🌱 I grow underground

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows on a vine. I can be green, red, or purple. Sometimes I'm made into juice. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am small and round
🍷 Some people make wine from me
🧺 I grow in bunches

plant.question: I have prickly skin and juicy inside. I grow in warm climates. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on a tree
🍍 I have a tough outer layer
🍹 My juice is delicious

plant.question: I am a plant that has needles instead of leaves and cones that hold seeds. I stay green all year long. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 People decorate me for Christmas
🐻 Some animals live in forests of my kind
🧭 I am often used to help determine direction in the wilderness.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. People love to eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a tall plant
🍿 I am often covered in butter and salt
🎬 I am a popular snack

plant.question: I'm a climbing plant with prickly stems. I'm known for my beautiful, fragrant flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 I'm often given as a symbol of love.
🌹 You have to be careful when you hold me.
🧪 My scent is used to make perfume.

plant.question: I am a plant whose leaves are used to make a hot drink. I am grown in many different countries. What am I?

hints.text: 🍵 People often add milk or sugar to me.
☕ Some people drink me in the morning to wake up.
🌎 There are many different kinds of me from all over the world.

plant.question: I am a very tall tree that can live for thousands of years. I am known for my reddish bark and enormous size. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I grow mostly on the West Coast of North America.
🪵 I'm one of the tallest and oldest living things on Earth.
🏞️ You can find forests of me in California.

ocean.question: I have a shell and live in the ocean. I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am not very fast.
🏡 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat algae in a tank.

ocean.question: I am a big, blue mammal that lives in the ocean. I sing songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I'm the biggest animal on Earth.
🗣️ I communicate with sounds.
🌊 I breathe air but live in the water.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. I have a special name. What am I?

hints.text: 🤡 I'm orange and white.
🏠 I live in a sea anemone.
🎬 You may have seen me in a movie about finding someone.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can change color. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
🎨 I can camouflage myself.
🖐️ I have many arms.

ocean.question: I'm a large fish with sharp teeth. People are often scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I'm a predator.
🔪 My teeth are very sharp.
🌊 I live in all the world's oceans.

ocean.question: I am a type of plant that grows in the ocean and provides food and shelter for many animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I'm green and bend in the current.
🐠 Many fish hide in me.
🍃 I make oxygen in the ocean.

ocean.question: I'm a place in the ocean filled with colorful plants and animals. It's often called a rainforest of the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ I'm home to many creatures.
🧱 I'm made of tiny animals.
🌈 I am very colorful.

ocean.question: I am a strong, predictable movement of water in the ocean caused by wind, temperature and salt differences. What am I?

hints.text: ➡️ I move water from one place to another.
🌡️ Temperature plays a role in my creation.
🌪️ Winds affect my direction.

ocean.question: I'm a long chain of underwater mountains that runs through all the world's oceans. What am I?

hints.text: ⛰️ I'm very long.
🌋 Volcanoes are often found on me.
🌎 I'm found in every ocean.

ocean.question: I am a very deep, dark place in the ocean, much deeper than most other parts. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 Very little light reaches me.
🧊 The pressure is extremely high.
⚓ The deepest part of the ocean.
